sentences.sContent: I once carried a letter to a baron of that sort.
sentences.sContent_eng: I once carried a letter to a baron of that sort.
sentences.sCn: 有一次，我送一封信给一个男爵，他便是这样的。

words.tran: 男爵夫人；女男爵；（欧洲某些国家）男爵之女
男爵领地；男爵爵位；大片私有土地

trans.tranCn: 男爵(英国世袭的最低级的贵族爵位)
trans.tranOther: a man who is a member of a low rank of the British  nobility  or of a rank of European  nobility
